import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; const App = () => { const [scrollY, setScrollY] = useState(0); // Update scroll position on scroll useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrollY(window.scrollY); window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); return (
